# What is mWater? {background-image="jimmy.jpeg"}

## What is mWater? {style="font-size:36px; color:#195079;"}

<br>

> mWater is a data collection, analysis, and visualization software platform. An entire water system can be mapped and managed down to the individual component level by mWater. Assets can be tracked; work can be planned and monitored. Maintenance issues can be reported and addressed.

## What is mWater? {style="font-size:36px; color:#195079;"}

-   Design flexible surveys online
-   Track geolocated Sites for collaborative, longitudinal monitoring
-   Collect data using Android, iOS, or a browser
-   Import and export data
-   Work in multiple languages
-   Use standard Indicators for the SDGs and more
-   Visualize and map your live data online
-   Scale up to thousands of users and millions of surveys

# Working with mWater {background-image="shaddy.jpeg"}

## Creating a mWater account {style="font-size:48px; color:#195079;"}

> Go to Play Store and, using the following link, install the mWater

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=co.mwater.clientapp&hl=en

## Creating a mWater account {style="font-size:36px; color:#195079;"}

::: columns
::: {.column width="50%" style="font-size:18px;"}
-   STEP 1: Open the mWater Surveyor and click on Signup <br> ![](1.jpeg){width="350" height="700"}
:::

::: {.column width="50%" style="font-size:18px;"}
-   STEP 2: Enter your name, username, email address and a secret memorable password <br> ![](2.jpeg){width="350" height="700" fig-align="right"}
:::
:::

::: callout-important {style="font-size:18px;"} Please check that your email address is correct before creating an account! :::

## Logging in to verify your email {style="font-size:36px; color:#195079;"}

STEP 3 Login with your username or your account's email address.

::: callout-note
The app always checks for updates. If a new version is available, you might be asked to restart. Always press OK.
:::

# Naming and finding draft surveys {background-image="coolkid.jpeg"}

## Naming and finding draft surveys {style="font-size:24px; color:#195079;"}

mWater automatically saves any survey that you start. If you leave the app and come back, it will be saved in the Draft Surveys tab.

::: callout-caution
Please check before deleting surveys, as they cannot be retrieved!
:::

![](namingandsavingsurveys.png){width="703" fig-align="center"} 

# Deleting a survey {background-image="kids.jpeg"}

## Deleting a survey

::: callout-warning
Deleting a survey cannot be undone!

## Checking for data sync {style="font-size:28px; color:#195079;"}

::: columns
::: {.column .absolute top="50" left="-150" style="font-size:16px;"}
::: {.fragment .fade-in-then-out}
Data upload includes form responses - mWater always syncs this data first
:::
:::

::: {.column .absolute bottom="75" left="-50" style="font-size:16px;"}
::: {.fragment .fade-in-then-out}
Image upload - photos are synced after survey responses
:::
:::

::: {.column .absolute top="20" right="-150" style="font-size:16px;"}
::: {.fragment .fade-in-then-out}
Cache Sync - downloads updated data from mWater servers to your device
:::
:::

![](datasync.png){fig-align="center" width="881"}

[Make sure sync is **complete** before working offline. Offline sync happens automatically every 20 minutes, and when you open the app.]{style="color:red;font-size:16px;"}
:::
